multi_shot_examples.question: Which anatomical structures lack the expression of genes or proteins involved in the interaction with the fucose metabolism pathway?
What liquid drugs target the A2M gene/protein and bind to the PDGFR-beta receptor?
Which genes or proteins are linked to melanoma and also interact with TNFSF8?
